mapper.insert: insert into sellerHelpService(id, aboutUs, businessProcess, companyService, contactUs, joinUs, isChinese) values(#{id}, #{aboutUs}, #{businessProcess}, #{companyService}, #{contactUs}, #{joinUs}, #{isChinese})
mapper.update: update sellerHelpService set id = #{id} and aboutUs = #{aboutUs} and businessProcess = #{businessProcess} and companyService = #{companyService} and contactUs = #{contactUs} and joinUs = #{joinUs} and isChinese = #{isChinese}
update sellerHelpService set aboutUs = #{aboutUs} where id = 0
update sellerHelpService set businessProcess = #{businessProcess} where id = 0
update sellerHelpService set companyService = #{companyService} where id = 0
update sellerHelpService set contactUs = #{contactUs} where id = 0
update sellerHelpService set joinUs = #{joinUs} where id = 0
